name: Call Me Master
storyline:
I never thought that one day I would wake up in a glass coffin!

Where am I? I am also surrounded by handsome men with strange appearances. They stare at me as if I am a freak. They are also surprised that I have tears and blood! It's as if these are wonders they've never seen before. Crazy! Don't tell me they are not human. What are they? But one thing for sure, they are very interested in me and want to raise me as their slave! OMG why do I have to be a slave and they have to be my masters?
summary:
Slip into the future and turn into a slave to love?

"Call Me Master" is an otome dating game that will transport you to the future, where you will meet an enigmatic, attractive man!
